content.text:
Here is a draft memo for referring unresolved customer grievances:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO

To: Department Managers
From: Customer Service
Subject: Unresolved Customer Grievances for Further Investigation

Please review and investigate the following unresolved customer grievances that require additional follow-up:

1. Billing Department: Account #12345 - Customer disputes late fee charges
2. Product Development: Order #78901 - Reported product defect requires engineering review
3. Shipping Department: Tracking #ABCD1234 - Package marked as delivered but customer claims non-receipt
4. IT Department: User ID JSmith22 - Ongoing login issues on mobile app
5. Quality Assurance: Batch #X987 - Multiple complaints about product performance

Kindly provide status updates within 3 business days. Escalate to senior management if issues cannot be resolved within 1 week.

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
